      Methods in controller with parameters of type Direction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Grid.canMoveTo(Square fromSquare, Direction direction)
      Checks whether from the given fromSquare it is possible to move to a neighboring square in the given direction.

      Returns the last possible square an object can move to in the given direction with the given maximum range.

      Returns the neighbor of the given square.

      boolean Grid.hasNeighbor(Square fromSquare, Direction via, Square toSquare)
      Checks if the given squares are neighbors in the given direction.
